definition: Guangdong province (Kwangtung) in south China, short name 粵|粤[Yue4], capital Guangzhou 廣州|广州
surname Guang
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
wide/numerous/to spread
surname Dong
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)

sentences.english: Objective To study the poor eyesight situation of the students in the Xingning city and countryside.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解广东省兴宁市城乡中小学生视力不良状况。

sentences.english: Zhan Tianyou was born in 1861, in Nanhai County, Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 詹天佑1861年出生在广东省南海县。

sentences.english: Shunde, a small city in Guangdong, was buried in debt.
sentences.chinese: 而位于广东省的顺德市，此时也是负债累累。

sentences.english: Located in the northwest of Guangdong province, Guangning is a beautiful city.
sentences.chinese: 位于广东省的西北部，广宁是一个美丽的城市。

sentences.english: Parts of Shaoguan City in Guangdong Province have been flooded due to the sudden onslaught of heavy rains.
sentences.chinese: 广东省韶关市突然下起了大雨导致部分地区被淹。

sentences.english: Of course, what Guangdong does best is to produce.
sentences.chinese: 众目所知，广东省最出色的就是生产制造业。

sentences.english: The "Guangdong green" jade deposit is situated in Wuzhishan area, Ningxian county, Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: “广东绿”玉石矿床发育于广东省广宁县五指山地区。

sentences.english: Guangdong province is the nation’s biggest export base.
sentences.chinese: 广东省现在是中国最大的出口基地。

sentences.english: Deng Liangbo used to be an official in Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 邓梁波曾经是广东省的一位政府官员。

sentences.english: New Fengxian is located in Guangdong Province, in central north.
sentences.chinese: 新丰县位于广东省中部偏北。

sentences.english: Yunfu City of Guangdong belongs backward areas.
sentences.chinese: 云浮市属于广东省偏落后地区。

sentences.english: Chaoyang District in Guangdong Province, one of the famous hometown of overseas Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 潮阳区是广东省著名侨乡之一。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the cause of a measles outbreak in Wengyuan County.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析广东省翁源县一起麻疹暴发的原因。

sentences.english: China Building Ceramic Capital is located in Foshan City, Guangdong Province, the famous ceramic production enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 地处中国建陶之都广东省佛山市，著名陶瓷生产企业。

sentences.english: Mei Shan middle school, is the first class school of Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 梅山中学，是广东省一级学校。

sentences.english: QC group of copper beneficiation plant, Dabosan Mine Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 广东省大宝山矿业有限公司铜选厂选矿QC小组。

definition: Guangzhou subprovincial city and capital of Guangdong/Canton
Zhaoqing prefecture level city in Guangdong province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3] in south China

Jiangmen prefecture-level city in Guangdong
Foshan prefecture-level city in Guangdong 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3]
Heyuan prefecture-level city in Guangdong 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3]
Qingyuan prefecture level city in Guangdong province
Yunfu prefecture level city in Guangdong province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3] in south China
Jieyang prefecture-level city in Guangdong province
Huizhou prefecture-level city in Guangdong province
Chaozhou prefecture-level city in Guangdong 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3]
Zhanjiang prefecture level city in Guangdong province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3] in south China
Shaoguan prefecture level city in Guangdong province
Fujian province (Fukien) in east China, abbr. 閩|闽, capital Fuzhou 福州/Fujian province (Fukien) in Taiwan
